title: Arthritis And Exercise
content:
Knowing that others living with arthritis can and have overcome the same issues you have is very powerful in helping you stay connected and motivated.


![Father dancing with children at home](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Families/Father-dancing-with-kids-at-home-canva-950x690__ResizedImageWzYwMCw0MzZd.jpg) _Image credit: Canva_
#### Apps reviewed by Healthify
You may find it useful to look at some [Arthritis apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/a/arthritis-apps), [Physiotherapy and exercise apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/p/physiotherapy-and-exercise-apps), and [Exercise apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/e/exercise-apps).
####  Support 
[Arthritis NZ Mateponapona Aotearoa(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/ "Open external link") offers information and support to all people affected by arthritis. Phone 0800 663 463.
Find out about their Facebook, local face-to-face and monthly Zoom Café support groups on their [support page(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/support-groups/ "Open external link").
